pr_title: [#10355] Instructor view results: use default order for MCQ response summary

timeline.message: Use default order for MCQ response summary

timeline.bodyText: Since we need to sort by the choice/option, should pass in the initialSortBy to be SortBy.MCQ_CHOICE
timeline.author: t-cheepeng

replies.bodyText: Because the original order of the options may not be alphabetical. If we sort by MCQ choice the default ordering can be lost. This may not be intended in some cases I think.
replies.author: niqiukun

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason for removing the left most column sort?
timeline.author: t-cheepeng

replies.bodyText: The reason is the same as above. Using the left most column will lose the initial sorting of options.
replies.author: niqiukun
